title: 9/1 - Ultra Modern + Pet Friendly Studio Alcove in Brookline!
posting_body: Available for Sept 1st (Real Unit Photos) *Cleaned and painted between tenants*
Beautifully Renovated Studio located on the first floor of a professionally managed building on Marion St in Brookline, just two blocks from the heart of Coolidge Corner.
Easy commute to Longwood Medical and downtown Boston.

This listing features hardwood flooring throughout, a large open living area with a built-in AC, a modern kitchen with quartz counters, breakfast bar overlooking the main living space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave, a fully remodeled bathroom accented with a modern touch, and there is excellent closet space.
The rent includes heat, hot/cold water, and there are laundry facilities and a fitness center located in the building.
Common areas have been renovated to reflect the modernity of each unit.
Laundry is on the first floor, and a complimentary fitness center is located in the basement for all residents.
Small and large-sized pets are welcome, and aggressive breeds are restricted (Cats + Dogs).
There is off-street parking available for $225/Month.
- Pet-Friendly Building (Cats and Dogs are welcome with management's approval)
- Short walk to Coolidge Corner and Longwood Ave
- 3-4 minutes walking distance to Trader Joe's or Stop and Shop
- 6-minute walking distance to Griggs Park (3.3 Acres, Dog-Friendly)
- Laundry facilities in the building (Payable with coins or Mobile App)
- Car sharing is available from Zipcar and RelayRides
- The rent includes heat and hot/cold water
- Off-street parking is available next to the building for $225/per month
- 4-minute walk to the C-Line at Coolidge Corner Station
